text: One of the best bar experience so far. It is set up really nicely, cosy ambience, soft lighting, relaxing atmosphere to enjoy the unique selection with your friends. The creativity of the cocktails here are beyond anything we've ever experienced.sushi and skewers was good too! Definitely recommend all of my friends!

They have two units with outdoor seating, and the interior is beautifully decorated. However, there is only one restroom available.

The omakase set of eight costs $26 and comes in generous portions. The Kyoho grape beer, priced at $10, has a fruity taste. A variety of other alcoholic beverages are available, including unique cocktails that seem popular among diners.

Pleasant music plays in the background, enhancing the dining experience.

Not many tables available on weekday dinner. Scan QR for order online. Food takes very very very very very long to serve. Clams super good. Sake served in interesting cups. Pasta oily. Set of eight can skip. Should order the fire cocktail next time.

Had an amazing experience at TAAN IZA-BAR! The atmosphere was warm and perfect for a casual night out or a special occasion. The staff was friendly and attentive, making sure we had everything we needed.

Highly recommend TAAN IZA-BAR for anyone looking for a fantastic Japanese skewers and cutie cocktails.. Can't wait to visit again!

The ambience is fantastic, with a cozy and vibrant vibe that makes you feel right at home. The Japanese fusion food is absolutely delicious and surprisingly affordable. Each dish was a delightful blend of flavors that left me wanting more. The staff were friendly and attentive, adding to the overall great experience. Iâ€™ll definitely be bringing my friends here next time! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a place with great food and a chill atmosphere.
